question: Forward I am heavy, but backward I am not. What am I?
You can hold it without using your hands or arms. What is it?
What building has the most stories?
It's been around for millions of years, but is never more than a month old. What is it?
What has one eye, but cannot see?
What cannot talk, but will always respond when spoken to?
When you have me, you feel like sharing me. But, if you do share me, you dont have me. What am I?
I have a head like a cat. I have feet like a cat. But I am not a cat. What am I?
He has married many women, but has never been married. Who is he?
